CompOper.Name: CimsRunnum_Oper
CompOper.TransientExpression: return " IN (select CIAI_RUNNUM from TCI_ACTSHPITM, TSO_MST WHERE CIAI_DIVCOD = CIMS_DIVCOD AND CIAI_RUNNUM = CIMS_RUNNUM AND CIAI_DIVCOD = SOMS_DIVCOD AND CIAI_SO_RUNNUM = SOMS_RUNNUM and soms_docnbr in (select column_value from table(split(:soNumAdvVar,',')))) "

CompOper.Name: AdvTciMstVOCriteria_AdvTciMstVOCriteria_row_0_CimsRunnum_AdvTciMstVOCriteria_AdvTciMstVOCriteria_row_0_CimsRunnum_itemHolder_AdvTciMstVOCriteria_AdvTciMstVOCriteria_row_0_CimsRunnum_itemHolder_row_1_CimsRunnum_Oper
CompOper.TransientExpression: return " IN (SELECT CIAI_RUNNUM FROM TCI_ACTSHPITM, TSO_PON WHERE CIAI_DIVCOD = CIMS_DIVCOD AND CIAI_RUNNUM = CIMS_RUNNUM AND CIAI_DIVCOD = SOPO_DIVCOD AND CIAI_SO_RUNNUM = SOPO_RUNNUM AND SOPO_PO_NUM IN (SELECT COLUMN_VALUE FROM TABLE(SPLIT(:poNumAdvVar,',')))) "

CompOper.Name: CimsRunnum_Oper
CompOper.TransientExpression: return " IN (select CIAI_RUNNUM from TCI_ACTSHPITM, TSO_MST WHERE CIAI_DIVCOD = CIMS_DIVCOD AND CIAI_RUNNUM = CIMS_RUNNUM AND CIAI_DIVCOD = SOMS_DIVCOD AND CIAI_SO_RUNNUM = SOMS_RUNNUM and soms_docnbr in (select column_value from table(split(:soNumCoreVar,',')))) "
